lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, April 30 (U.P.) -- The nationalist weekly Gringoire of Marseille said today that the "French Fleet is now ready to play its part in the war" and that Dakar was the springboard from which "loyalist forces can leave to reconquer dissident colonies in Africa."
abstract: Wash rumors rept French troops released from German captivity to be used for drive against Syria; Marseille Gringoire repts P Henriot statement on readiness of French Fleet and possible use of Dakar as springboard to reconquer dissident African colonies

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
